subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Dave Zabriskie rode to a dominating time trial victory and Levi Leipheimer was second to cut Chris Horner’s overall lead to 39 seconds after the sixth stage of the Tour of California.
snippet: Dave Zabriskie rode to a dominating time trial victory and Levi Leipheimer was second to cut Chris Horner’s overall lead to 39 seconds after the sixth stage of the Tour of California.
